question: Takht Harmandir Sahib, the birthplace of Guru Gobind Singh is located in which among the following cities?
explanation: Guru Gobind Singh was born as Gobind Rai on 22 December 1666 at Takht Harmandir Sahib or Patna Sahib (Present day Patna, Bihar, India). Wazir Khan (A Muslim army commander and the Nawab of Sarhandh) sent two Pathan assassins named Jamshed Khan and Wasil Beg to kill Gobind Singh. They succeded and killed Guru Gobind Singh on 7th October 1708.
